pages.text: The Shub Niggurath is not summoned directly. First, summon a $(l:rituals/familiars/familiar_shub_niggurath)Chimera$(/l) familiar and feed it a $(thing)Golden Apple$() to detach the goat. Bring the goat to a $(bold)Forest Biome$(). Then click the goat with $(thing)Black Dye$(), $(thing)Flint$(), and $(thing)Eye of Ender$() to summon the Shub Niggurath.
The Shub Niggurath familiar will periodically summon spawns that explode when close to enemies.
When upgraded by a blacksmith familiar, it will get a warning bell. When you hit the familiar it will ring the bell and attract enemies in a large radius.
